https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2FhaSy7dP4qDVjAMXh8lLnAS4I1.jpg Ambrosia is the story of an Iranian-Canadian couple, Ali and Leila, who dream of an exciting future in Vancouver: Ali owns a pizza shop and thinks of expanding and Leila is an up-and-coming clothing designer. However, their situations change dramatically when Ali's shop is affected by bad economy and Leila is hired to work at a fashion design firm. Ambrosia
